tesla.welcome:
Welcome to Tesla Order Status Bot! 🚗

Features:
• Track your Tesla order status in real-time
• Get notified of status changes automatically
• View detailed order information

Commands:
/login - Authenticate with your Tesla account
/orderstatus - Check your current order status
/enablemonitoring - Enable automatic status monitoring
/disablemonitoring - Disable automatic monitoring
/monitoringstatus - Check monitoring status
/logout - Remove your authentication
/help - Show this help message

Start by using /login to connect your Tesla account!

auth.already_authenticated: You are already logged in! Use /orderstatus to check your orders.
auth.login_required: You need to login first! Use /login to authenticate.
auth.login_url_message:
🚗 Tesla Account Login

Click the link below to login to your Tesla account:
{}

After logging in, you'll be redirected to a blank page. Copy the entire URL from your browser's address bar and send it back to me.

The URL will look like:
https://auth.tesla.com/void/callback?code=...

⚠️ Note: This URL will contain your authorization code, so keep it private!
auth.invalid_tesla_url:
That doesn't look like a Tesla authentication URL. 

Please copy the entire URL from your browser after logging in. 
It should start with: https://auth.tesla.com/void/callback?code=
auth.token_expired: Token expired or invalid: {}. Your authentication has been cleared. Please /login again.
auth.success:
Successfully logged in! ✅
Fetching your Tesla orders...
auth.invalid_url_format: Invalid URL format. Please send the complete URL starting with https://
auth.auth_code_not_found: Authorization code not found in the URL. Please make sure you copied the complete URL.
auth.logout_success: Successfully logged out! Your authentication has been removed.

orders.no_orders_found: No orders found on your Tesla account.
orders.basic_info_only: 📋 Showing basic order information. Detailed delivery tracking is temporarily unavailable due to Tesla API changes.
orders.congratulations_delivered: 🎉 Congratulations! Your Tesla has been delivered!
orders.ready_for_delivery: 🚗 Great news! Your Tesla is ready for delivery!
orders.in_transit: 🚛 Your Tesla is on its way!
orders.vin_exciting: 🎯 Exciting! Your Tesla has been assigned a VIN!

monitoring.enabled:
✅ Automatic monitoring enabled!

I'll check your Tesla order status every 5 minutes and notify you of any changes.
monitoring.disabled:
🔕 Automatic monitoring disabled.

You can still check your order status manually with /orderstatus

admin.only: Sorry, this command is only available to administrators.
admin.interval_updated:
✅ Tesla monitoring interval updated!
New interval: {} seconds
Previous interval: {} seconds
admin.invalid_interval:
❌ Invalid interval. Please provide a valid number of seconds.
Usage: /teslacron <seconds>
Example: /teslacron 300 (for 5 minutes)

errors.edit_no_field:
❌ Please specify a field to edit.

Examples:
/edit km (reduces by 10km)
/edit km 150.5
/edit location (sets to Paris)
/edit location 12345
/edit date (sets to 1 week earlier)
/edit date 'Jan 15-22, 2024'
errors.no_order_data: No order data found. Please run /orderstatus first to load your orders.
errors.invalid_km_value: ❌ Invalid km value. Please provide a number (e.g., /edit km 150.5)
errors.invalid_location_id: ❌ Invalid location ID. Please provide a number (e.g., /edit location 12345)
errors.unknown_field:
❌ Unknown field. Supported fields: km, location, date

Examples:
/edit km 150.5
/edit location 12345
/edit date 'Jan 15-22, 2024'
errors.edit_success:
✅ {}

🔄 Run /orderstatus to see the simulated changes in action!
errors.no_orders_to_edit: No orders found to edit. Please run /orderstatus first.

help.user_commands:
🚗 Tesla Order Status Bot - Available Commands:

🔑 Authentication:
• /login - Connect your Tesla account
• /logout - Disconnect your Tesla account

📊 Order Management:
• /orderstatus - Check your current order status
• /enablemonitoring - Enable automatic status monitoring
• /disablemonitoring - Disable automatic monitoring
• /monitoringstatus - Check monitoring status

⚙️ Settings:
• /language - Change language preference
• /help - Show this help message

📝 Testing (for development):
• /edit <field> [value] - Simulate order changes

Start by using /login to connect your Tesla account!

language.current:
🌐 Current language: English

Available languages:
🇺🇸 English - /language en
🇹🇷 Türkçe - /language tr

Click a command above to change language.
language.invalid:
❌ Invalid language code. Available options:
• /language en (English)
• /language tr (Turkish)

common.invalid_command: Invalid command. Type /help for available commands.
